item.deipotentia.what_we_did_in_the_dese: eightiesheadachetape - what we did in the desert
misc.deipotentia.text.invalid_uuid_0: Pffft, you don't have it in you.
misc.deipotentia.text.invalid_uuid_1: Did you really think you're worthy?
misc.deipotentia.text.invalid_uuid_3: Nah look at this twink. I'm not giving power to that.
misc.deipotentia.text.invalid_usage: You can't do that right now...
misc.deipotentia.text.presence: You feel a strange feeling shivering down your spine...
tooltip.deipotentia.sickle.warped_sickle: A tool capable of bringing the master's soul along when thrown.
Used similar to an ender pearl on right click.
tooltip.deipotentia.sickle.crimson_sickl: A tool forged in the depths of literal hell, still hot and fresh for use.
Throws a Fireball on right click.
tooltip.deipotentia.sickle.sturdy_sickle: A tool also very handy for mashing anything in your path of cultivation.
Replenishes 50% of missing health on right click.
tooltip.deipotentia.sickle.nymph_sickle: A tool crafted by forest Nymphs helping you in all your farming needs.
Breaks other nearby crops when right clicking one.
enchantment.deipotentia.soulbound.desc: Returns items enchanted with it to your inventory post death.
